content: an easy stitch pattern for an asymmetric shawl using just one ball of cake yarn in a dk weight/light worsted weight the shawl is a boomerang shape that is perfect for wrapping around your shoulders and makes a warm cosy scarf against winter winds the pattern is an easy make using basic stitches only once you have the first few row worked up it is a simple 2-row repeat you can adjust the pattern easily by making more or fewer row to make the size you want **measurements** shawl measures 70 in 178cm in longest length x 56 in 102cm x 31 in 79cm after blocking a free version is available on my blog
